name: Averie
about: Hi! I’m Averie, a passionate stylist dedicated to making you look and feel your best. I believe that great hair is more than just style—it’s a way to express your personality and boost your confidence. Whether you’re here for a fresh cut, a bold color transformation, or a simple trim, I take the time to listen to your needs and tailor each service to suit you perfectly. I love lived-in color and all variations of haircutting. I’m always excited to stay up to date on the latest trends and techniques. My goal is to create a relaxing and friendly experience, making sure you leave the salon not just with a new look, but with a smile. I can’t wait to work with you and help bring your hair dreams to life!
